transcript: sometimes there are things that are easy to sell but really hard to fulfill and some things that are hard to sell but really easy to fulfill if I'm selling done for you Services of any kind so if I just say I'm going to do all of your social media for you someone might buy that cuz it's like wow you're doing everything really easy to sell really difficult to deliver on on the flip side a course for example is usually pretty hard to sell honestly cuz so many people are doing it but it's pretty easy to deliver on and so the idea that I try to do is try to find the things that hit the Best of Both Worlds and then that way you get lots of sales that you can continue to scale
